physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features an elderly man. He is sitting down and looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. He adorns a long-sleeved shirt that has flowery patterns all over.

 Chin Koon Lawyers
sgcool_label_text:This photograph shows Lee Chin Koon (1903-1997)
 father of Lee Kuan Yew (1923-2015) who was the first Prime Minster of Singapore. Born in Indonesia
 he was the attorney to the Sugar King Oei Tiong Ham
 and the first honorary secretary of the Chinese Swimming Club.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows Lee Chin Koon (1903-1997), father of Lee Kuan Yew (1923-2015) who was the first Prime Minster of Singapore. Born in Indonesia, he was the attorney to the Sugar King Oei Tiong Ham, and the first honorary secretary of the Chinese Swimming Club.
